content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "flint", "quantity": 21, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft bricks, I need to place 4 brick blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. I will start by moving 1 brick from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 21, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: I will now move another brick to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 21, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: Next, I will move a brick to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 21, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last brick to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4. This will complete the 2x2 square of bricks in the crafting table, and I will be able to craft the bricks.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bricks
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 21, "index": 12}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_concrete_powder", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that the bricks have been crafted, I will move them from the crafting table (slot 0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
